# 尚硅谷 React 全栈项目硅谷直聘

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shang-guigu-react-quanzhan-xiangmu-guigu-zhipin
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shang-guigu-react-quanzhan-xiangmu-guigu-zhipin
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shang-guigu-react-quanzhan-xiangmu-guigu-zhipin
shang-guigu-react-quanzhan-xiangmu-guigu-zhipin <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shang-guigu-react-quanzhan-xiangmu-guigu-zhipin
shang-guigu-react-quanzhan-xiangmu-guigu-zhipin <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
